I tried to take further action to be moved again on the advise of one of the maintenance men & when I approached the front desk I was responded with the reply it will cost you a further $10 a day but to my dismay I had already paid upfront to stay for 2 weeks. This use to be a thriving & wonderful place but not now so beware.....................

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Location!”
Reviews.Author: momof2inohio
Reviews.Content: BUDGET FRIENDLY!!!! Great the location, very close to Disney parks (literally 5 minutes away). Rooms are quite spacious for family. Bedroom adjoins with door and vanities. Great family room space as well as kitchen with table! Good for bringing your own food (big fridge). Very close to nice restaurants for a night out. Enjoyed the little shops at Old Town right outside our room door. Also tourist shopping across the street. Management and other staff were very friendly. Overall, very pleased with our stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great price, great location, great room”
Reviews.Author: Jramsey9903
Reviews.Content: The Suites at Oldtown are located In a perfect place if you are going to Old Town or any of the amusement parks. 5 min drive to Disney. Walking distance to several restaurants and shopping. We spent one evening at Old Towne and made the 5 min drive to Disney the next day. Room is huge!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel & Convenient Location!”
Reviews.Author: Cjraencore
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in August with our kids, and were looking for something close to the park, yet comfortable & roomy and we definitely found it! The service was wonderful, rooms kept nice & neat, and loved the spacious suites.. We will definitely be coming back here on our next trip!

Reviews.Title: “Will never go back!”
Reviews.Author: wilster006
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and our 4 kids stayed here for 2 nights. We paid for the remodeled suite. It was disgusting and the only thing "remodeled" was it had a new mattress. They didnt even take the plastic off the boxsprings. I'd have left if I hadnt prebooked and wouldve been out my money. The back buildings were more like run down apartments that people live in all the time. Laundry hanging out all over the balcony, groups of seedy looking people hanging out. Even hookers running around. I swear, this is not exageration. They were in thigh high boots and could be seen coming in and out of various room through the day. The pool had a green bottom. The noise from the amusement park was so loud, thankfully the obnoxious a/c drowned that out. I would never stay here again! Id give it a 2 out of 10. If you shop around online you can find a better deal or a much nicer place for the same money. Across the street is a HoJos. Nothing to write home about but the price was $30 and the room was clean and they kept up with the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Service and accomdation”
Reviews.Author: mrsmel
Reviews.Content: The service was very good, the rooms were clean and comfortable. I have used this hotel before and I would used it a again. The cost is very affordable

Reviews.Title: “This place is a dump!”
Reviews.Author: brennan071
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel a few times in the past and I think it gets worse each time. Checked in and went to room and it smelled like smoke. Tried to call front desk but phone didn't work. Drove back up and was given 2nd room. This one smelled like urine. Went back up and was given upgraded room. The only thing that was updated in room was the matresses were new and even they were cheap ones. The room was dirty, the tile was coming up in the kitchen, drawers were broken. Stains on carpets and couch. Missing remote for tv. You could see light on the side of the door from the gap. Peep hole was missing in door so you could see right in. The only good thing is the price and it is right next to old town. Thursday nights are bad because it is bike night at old town and they drive by till late. I also believe they use this as low income housing also. Walked by some rooms and people has pictures on wall and plants.
